name: Adult Sea Dragon
senses: blindsight 60 ft., darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 24

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon uses its Frightful Presence. It then makes one Bite attack and two Fin attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) cold damage.

actions.name: Fin
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Frightful Presence
actions.desc: Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 120 feet of the dragon and aware of it must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the dragon's Frightful Presence for the next 24 hours.

actions.name: Tidal Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales a crushing wave of frigid seawater in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 20 Dexterity saving throw. On a failure, the creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage and 33 (6d10) cold damage and is pushed up to 30 feet away from the dragon and knocked prone. On a success, the creature takes half the damage and isn't pushed or knocked prone.

legendary_desc: The dragon can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action option can be used at a time and only at the end of another creatureâ€™s turn. The dragon regains spent legendary actions at the start of its turn.

legendary_actions.name: Detect
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Tail attack.

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then move up to half its flying speed, or half its swimming speed if in the water.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

special_abilities.name: Siege Monster
special_abilities.desc: The dragon deals double damage to objects and structures.
